trends: There has been one other sighting in Swansea
There were no other sightings in Swansea on or around January 1st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright light, moved from center, to left 3 smaller lights no bright light, to right, hovered, dissapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving in Swansea, Ma I spotted a very bright yellow circular light in the sky and it caught my attention. It was located in fround of me. It then quickly moved to the left of my car and the bright light was shut off, when the bright light was off i noticed 3 smaller lights in a row. The craft then quickly moved to the right side of the street and hovered there for a while. I kept my eye on it until I lost it for 2 seconds while driving past a tall tree. Once past the tree the object was gone completely. No sight of it at all. The whole time I was baffled as to what it could be moving in such an odd pattern and with such odd lights.
